item.title: kakfa丢失消息的场景
item.description: Error handling is one of the most important aspects of building reliable systems. Today, we will discuss an important topic: Can Kafka lose messages? A common belief among many developers is that Kafka, by its very design, guarantees no message loss. However, understanding the nuances of Kafka’s architecture and configuration is essential to truly grasp how and when it might lose messages, and more importantly, how to prevent such scenarios.
